Name: Amortizer Off-Road
About the game: Amortizer is a casual off-road experience. You will find your self in various nature environment, driving 4x4 machine. Game does not have any progress. Its made for true off-road lovers. You have seven linear maps to complete, without hurry. Be prepared for mudy,rocky,sandy,snowy environment. Prove that you can sustain in all circumstances. Sit back and enjoy the bumpy ride. After that you can scout around in two open world maps. Features - Realistic Physics - Deformable Terrain - Various Natural Environments - 9 Levels (7 linear levels to complete and 2 medium size open world maps)
